title: Bots in all of my ARAM games.
body:
I don't know if it's because I slipped in MMR or people are buying accounts for Christmas, but I can't get a game of ARAM where one team doesn't just lose because they have the most bots.
It's amazingly frustrating. I think I'll be putting down league until next year. I'm just really over it right now.

replies.body:
I was thinking the same thing. The matchmaking is bugged or broken. Or all the kids started playing and slipped into our game.
The bots usually miss or spam abilities. Most of them don't even hit.
They also LOVE to stand around.
Hopefully this will get sorted out because I liked playing aram before but now i'm probably gonna play less and less until I completely stop.
